thread.title: Record spending in top English soccer league

title: Record spending in top English soccer league
text:
Record spending in top English soccer league 5:11pm GMT - 01:32 
Premier League clubs in Britain spent £430m in the January transfer window, smashing the previous record by £205m. As Kate King reports, the Deloitte's survery suggests total Premier league spending for the season could top £1.9 billion. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Premier League clubs in Britain spent £430m in the January transfer window, smashing the previous record by £205m. As Kate King reports, the Deloitte's survery suggests total Premier league spending for the season could top £1.9 billion.
